description.p: Enables or disabled detailed JavaScript error reporting in the Grid Component at run-time.

discussion.p: The Grid component generates a *[js:widow.onerror]* event handler to report Javascript errors. This event handler displays an alert with a full stack. In some cases, where you are loading 3rd party Javascript libraries, that might throw benign errors on loading, you might want to suppress this error reporting.
The *[ui:Capture detailed Javascript error information]* property allows you to turn detailed Javascript error reporting on or off.
